name: Pre0-17-60Oil
title: Classic Factorio Basic Oil Processing
author: FuryoftheStars
description: Reverts oil changes and the affected techs and recipes to the way they were before 0.17.60, allowing Basic Oil Processing to output all 3 fluid products, with the difference between Basic and Advanced being the output ratios (Advanced favors Petroleum Gas while Basic is more balanced).  Includes optional settings to piecemeal disable the tech reversions.
